name: Victor's Vector
description:
Welcome back to Retro gaming!

Playing as a little robot called Victor, explore a cube-based world, filled with neon colours and 80s vibes, whilst making every step and rewind count, throughout your puzzle-based journey.

Victor’s Vector was created for the 2019 Unreal Engine 4 Summer Game Jam by Harlan Designs. The team consisting of:

Alan Horton- Technical Designer
Eli De Carteret- Level and Game Designer
Tom Bennett- Sound Designer and Composer
Lee Stockton- 3D Artist

Controls:
Left Mouse Button (clicked on arrow direction on screen)- Move direction

Thank you for checking out and downloading our game!

Used Content:

Everything was created by the team except for the particle effect which is Carton FX 2
